title: My emoji key board is full size. How do I make it half screen to also real the text above?
content: I am trying to minimize my emoji keyboard back to how it was before so I could tap the face at the bottom and bring up an half screen showing of emojis. Currently it's going almost full screen and I can't now see the message I want to reply to either.. I've tried setting , key board size, pinching the screen, uninstall and reinstall
